resources.string: This app requires Precise Location permission to function properly. Press back twice to exit the app, and then please re-run the app to grant permission.
Error trying to read the chosen file, this app only reads files with CSV or DB extensions. Press back twice to exit the app, and then please re-run the app to try again.
Error trying to read the embedded DB file. Please make sure the file name is correct before rebuilding the app. This app will now terminate.
Error trying to read the selected DB file. Please make sure the file name is correct. This app will now restart.
Error trying to read the embedded CSV file. Please make sure the file name is correct before rebuilding the app.
Error trying to read the chosen file, perhaps this app does not have permission to read the file. Press back twice to exit the app, and then please re-run the app to try again.
Error trying to read the chosen file, this app only reads properly formatted CSV files. Press back twice to exit the app, and then please re-run the app to try again.
Database did not finish loading before termination, please select a CSV file again.

Not all addresses were successfully geocoded to markers. Press back twice to exit the app, and then please re-run the app to try again. If you keep seeing this error, contact your system administrator.
The API Key could not be fetched from Firebase server. Press back twice to exit the app, and then please re-run the app to try again. If you keep seeing this error, contact your system administrator.
Root or debugging detected. Your organization has prevented this app from running in these modes. This app will now terminate.
Firebase App Check failed. Your organization requires a valid App Check token from Firebase. Make sure your wifi/data is connected and try again. This app will now terminate.
